docs.title: Welcome to RetRO - Where Ragnarok Begins Again
General
docs.text:
• Episode: 13.1: Ash Vacuum
  • Server Type: Pre-Renewal
  • Max Level: 99/70
  • Max Status Normal/Baby: 99
  • Max ASPD: 193
  • Instant Cast: 150 dex
  • Server Time: UTC
  • Emulator: rAthena
  • International Server
  • Server Language: English

docs.title: Rates
docs.text:
• Exp: 5x
  • Normal Monster Items Drops and Cards: 5x
  • MvP Items Drops: 3x
  • Mini Boss and MvP Card Drops: 1x

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• No Job Changer
  • No Free Healer or Buffer
  • Special System Coin
  • No Sell Cards
  • Daily Rewards System
  • Eden Group
  • Quality of Life Improvements
  • MVP Instances
  • Reset stats/skills
  • GRF editing allowed
  • Cosmetic only cash shop

docs.text:

docs.title: Channels
docs.text:
To keep communication organized and clean, our server uses custom chat channels.\ Please use the right channel for the right purpose so everyone can enjoy their stay.

🌍 #main – General Chat

The main public channel for everyone.

Use #main for:

  • General chat and socializing
  • Asking simple gameplay questions
  • Announcing events, runs, or LFP/LFG

Keep it friendly and readable for everyone.

docs.title: 💰 #trade – Market & Deals
docs.text:
All buying, selling, and trading should go to this channel.

Use #trade for:

  • WTB / WTS / WTT (buy/sell/trade)
  • Price checks and offers
  • Advertising your merchant shop

docs.title: 🛟 #party – Help & Assistance
docs.text:
Use #party to find groups or recruit members for your party.

Use #party for:

  • Looking for a party (LFP)
  • Recruiting members for your group (LFM)
  • Organizing dungeon runs, leveling parties, or MVP hunts
  • Announcing roles, levels, or schedules needed for your group

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
@rates

Displays the server rates.

@refresh

Synchronizes the player's position on the client with the one stored on the server. Additionally, @refreshall will refresh all online players.

@autotrade

Allows you continue vending offline, then logs off. The character will continue vending until you log in to that account again, all items are sold, or the mapserver closes.

@iteminfo

Displays item information (type, price, weight, drops).

Example: @iteminfo Jellopy

@noask

Toggles automatic rejection of deals and invites.

@showexp

Toggles the display of experience gain messages.

@ksprotection

Toggles Kill Steal Protection.

@showdelay

Shows or hides the red "Cannot use the skills" message.

@autolootitem <+/- item name/ID> @autolootitem reset

Starts or stops autolooting a specified item. Typing "reset" will clear the autoloot item list. By default, 10 items can be autolooted at one time.

@whereis

Displays the maps in which monster normally spawns. This does not include mobs summoned by scripts.

@whodrops

Displays a list of mobs which drop the specified item. Only the highest drop rates are shown.

@showzeny

Toggles the display of Zeny gain messages.

@hominfo / @homstats

Displays homunculus stats in different formats.

@commands

Displays a list of @ commands available to the player.

@autoloot {<%>}

Enables or disables autolooting items from killed mobs. If a percentage is given, only items dropped at that rate and below will be autolooted.

@mobinfo

Displays monster information (rates, stats, drops, MVP data).

Example: @mobinfo Poring

@ltp

Activates or deactivates a minimap marker showing the last location where the character was teleported.

@woetime

Displays the days and times when War of Emperium (WoE) events occur on the server.

@autopot {} {}

Allows configuring automatic usage of healing items for HP or SP. The item will be used when the defined HP/SP percentage is reached, respecting the configured delay.

docs.title: Fast Regen
docs.text: While sitting, your HP and SP recovery faster.

docs.title: Auto identify
docs.text: Items are identified automatically.

docs.title: Group Eden
docs.text: To help you to get basic equipment.

docs.title: Thanatos Tower
docs.text: Removed requirement to enter Level 3

docs.title: Server Rules
docs.text:
POLICY:

  1. Manners: Any form of harassments , discrimination, toxic, and other unacceptable behavior will not be tolerated by any means. Always treat you fellow players with respect as we are building a friendly and non-toxic community.
  2. Real Money Trading (RMT): Selling items or zeny for real money is permitted. However, the server/team assumes no liability for any item losses arising from scams or fraudulent transactions.
  3. Gameplay: We highly encourage everyone to play fair for a quality gaming experience. Any form of cheating, botting, or bug exploiting will not be tolerated.
  4. GM Staff: Game Masters will not initiate private messages or request login credentials. Any GM impersonation will result in a permanent ban. Please notify staff immediately if such an event occurs.
  5. Advertisement: Advertising or promoting other games, private servers, or websites is strictly prohibited.

docs.title: Bronze Coin
docs.text: • A basic currency commonly found across the world of RetRO, dropped by most monsters with a 5% chance.

docs.title: Silver Coin
docs.text: • A refined currency awarded through server events and special challenges.

docs.title: Gold Coin
docs.text: • A rare and prestigious currency, dropped by almost every MVP monsters.

docs.title: Automatic Events
docs.text: NPC Location Description Cluckers /navi prontera 156/219 Click the chicken and try retrieve the item at a low chance. If you fail he will nuke, freeze, stone, stun, or make you fall asleep. Disguise Event /navi prontera 170/199 Guess a monster name correctly for prizes. Devil Square /navi prontera 127/193 Defeat waves of monsters for a reward. Lottery /navi prontera 164/174 Daily lottery draw Black Jack Dealer /navi prontera 164/170 Black Jack card game. Death Match /navi prontera 140/176 PvP event that opens registration every 2 hours. Cursed Knight /navi prontera 140/174 Teams have to find the Cursed Knight located at the bottom end of the map. Fortress /navi prontera 140/172 Last team that controls the Main Fortress wins the match.

docs.title: Hourly Points System
docs.text: Earn rewards just by playing! Our Hourly Points System gives you special points while you’re online in-game.

docs.title: How It Works
docs.text:
• Stay logged in to earn Hourly Points.
  • For every set amount of online time your character automatically receives points.

💡 Tip: Think of Hourly Points as a loyalty reward for simply spending time on the server.

docs.title: Where to Spend Hourly Points
docs.text:
You can use your Hourly Points in the Goldpoint Manager, accessible inside the Break Room. There you’ll find a variety of categories such as:

NPC Location Goldpoint Manager prt_in,45,117

docs.title: Why We Have This System
docs.text: The Hourly Points System is our way of saying thank you for spending time with us. Whether you’re grinding, chatting, or partying with friends, you’re always working toward extra rewards!

docs.title: Custom NPCs
docs.text:
You will find a wide variety of NPCs inside our Break Room, offering essential services and features.

NPC Location Description Dimensius /navi prontera 160/191 and Centrally located in almost every town. Warper that works only after locations are unlocked. Jimmy lhz_dun04 145/276 Exchange items from lhz_dun04 to HD Oridecon or Elunium Reset Girl /navi prt_in 45/94 Reset status and skills Stylist prontera 157/196 Changes your hair style, hair color, and cloth color. Advanced Bag Instructor /navi prontera 170/179 warps players to the Advanced Punching Bag training spot Platinum Skill NPC /navi prt_in 42/115 Assigns quests skills for all classes Special Assistant /navi prontera 158/187 Special Assistant (Savepoint + Storage + Guild Storage + Buffs) MVP Record Keeper /navi prontera 147/174 MVP Ranking & History Magnus /navi prt_in 38/104 Hat's quests Questboard /navi prontera 148/190 Allows players to accept multiple Collection and Hunting quests to earn exp, zeny and silver coins.

docs.title: Skill Changes
docs.text: Skill Modification Teleport Using level 1 teleport skips the menu window Adrenaline Rush Duration: 30/60/90/120/150s -> 60/90/120/150/180 Arrow Vulcan Removed after-cast walk delay Aspersio Duration: 60/90/120/150/180 -> 120/240/360/480/600 Bowling Bash No gutter line and 7x7 area Mammonite Cost reduced by 50% Over Thrust Duration: 20/40/60/80/100s -> 60/90/120/150/180s Sonic Blow Removed after-cast walk delay. Enchant Deadly Poison Duration: 40/45/50/55/60s -> 70/75/80/85/90s Preserve Becomes a toggle on / off skill Throw Kunai Reduced after cast delay to 0.5 seconds. Throw Huuma Shuriken Reduced after cast delay to 1 seconds. Rapid Shower After cast delay of 0.5 second. Tarot Card Each card is 1/14 chance SG Skills Allow use without proper day Double Attack Works with critical
